definition: History of the Sui Dynasty, thirteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Wei Zheng 魏徵|魏征[Wei4 Zheng1] in 636 during Tang Dynasty, 85 scrolls
the Sui dynasty (581-617 AD)/surname Sui
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
book/letter/document/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]/to write

sentences.english: As the first to write a biography of Tiele, Sui Shu is the basis of the research concerning Tiele.
sentences.chinese: 《隋书》最早为铁勒立传，是研究铁勒史的基本史料。
